sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container class="pa-0" v-if="platform" >
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-row>
            <v-col>
      <PlatformDetail
        :platform="platform"
        :platformFees="platformFees"
        @modify-platform="getPlatformData"
        @add-portfolio="getPlatformData"
        @modify-fees="getBoth"

      />
    </v-col>
  </v-row>

      </v-col>
          <v-col>
            <PlatformAAChartSummary
              :platform="platform"
      />
          </v-col>
</v-row>
<v-row>
  <v-col v-if="platform.platform_total != null">
    <!-- <template
      v-for="platformFee in platformFees"
      >

      </template> -->
      <InvestmentSummary
        @add-investment="getPlatformData"
        @delete-object="getPlatformData"
        :platformTotal="platform.platform_total"      />
      </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import PlatformDetail from "@/components/PlatformDetail.vue";
import InvestmentSummary from "@/components/InvestmentSummary.vue";
import PlatformAAChartSummary from "@/components/PlatformAAChartSummary.vue";
import {
  CLEAR_ACTIVE_PLATFORM,
  CLEAR_ACTIVE_SCENARIO,
} from "@/store/mutations.type";
import {
  SCENARIO_FETCH,
  PLATFORM_FETCH
} from "@/store/actions.type";



export default {
  name: "Platform",
  provide() {
    return {
      platformId: this.id,
      scenarioId: this.scenarioId
    };
  },
  props: {
    scenarioId: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    id: {
      type: Number,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      platform: {},
      platformFees: [],
      error: null,
      feeColors: [
        'red',
        'teal',
        'green',
        'orange',
        'yellow',
      ]
    };
  },
  components: {
    InvestmentSummary,
    PlatformDetail,
    PlatformAAChartSummary,
  },
  methods: {
    setPageTitle(title) {
      document.title = title;
    },
    getBoth() {
      this.getPlatformData();
      this.getPlatformFeeData();
    },
    getPlatformData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.id}/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.platform = data;
        if (data.name != null) {
          this.setPageTitle(data.name.name);
        } else {
          this.setPageTitle(data.custom_name);
        }
        this.getPlatformFeeData();
      });
    },
    getPlatformFeeData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.id}/platformfees/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.platformFees = data.results;
      });
    },
    setActiveScenario(){
      if (!this.activeScenario.id) {
        this.$store.dispatch(SCENARIO_FETCH, this.scenarioId)
      }
      if (!this.activePlatform.id) {
        this.$store.dispatch(PLATFORM_FETCH, {
          'scenarioId': this.scenarioId,
          'platformId': this.id
        })
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getPlatformData();
    this.setActiveScenario();
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    this.$store.commit(CLEAR_ACTIVE_PLATFORM);
  },
  beforeRouteLeave(to, from, next) {
    if (to.name != "scenario") {
      this.$store.commit(CLEAR_ACTIVE_SCENARIO);
    }
    next()
  }
};
</script>
